installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Empyrion Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt update
apt -y install curl unzip
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam

export HOME=/mnt/server

mkdir -p /mnt/server/empyrion
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Logs
mkdir -p /mnt/server/empyrion/logs
touch /mnt/server/empyrion/logs/current.log

cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt

if [ "${VERSION}" == "experimental" ]; then
    ./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server/empyrion +login anonymous +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +app_update 530870 -beta experimental validate +quit
else
    ./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server/empyrion +login anonymous +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +app_update 530870 validate +quit
fi

## setup 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## setup 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## add below your custom commands if needed

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
